ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
3-inch touchscreen display; 5-megapixel digital camera with Schneider Kreuznach optics and video capture
Bluetooth stereo music; MicroSD expansion to 2 GB; digital audio/video player; organizer and document viewer
Up to 4 hours of talk time, up to 430 hours (17.9 days) of standby time
Compatible with 900/1800/1900 frequencies and International 3G compatibility via 2100 UMTS/HSDPA plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
ProductInfo.Name: LG KU990 Triband World Phone (Unlocked)
